Lyric:
[00:13.100]
[00:27.100]
[00:27.390]They told him don't you ever come around here
[00:30.070]Don't wanna see your face' you better disappear
[00:33.250]The fire's in their eyes and their words are really clear
[00:36.400]So beat it' just beat it
[00:38.960]
[00:40.150]You better run' you better do what you can
[00:42.930]Don't wanna see no blood' don't be a macho man
[00:45.790]You wanna be tough' better do what you can
[00:49.120]So beat it' but you wanna be bad
[00:52.020]Just beat it' beat it
[00:52.400]
[00:55.490]No one wants to be defeated
[00:58.780]Showin' how funky strong is your fight
[01:02.250]It doesn't matter who's wrong or right
[01:05.520]Just beat it
[01:06.820]Just beat it

[01:09.950]Just beat it
[01:10.980]

[01:23.830]
[01:24.970]You have to show them that you're really not scared
